        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getTranslations(java.util.List<java.lang.String> words,
                                                                                        java.lang.String from,
                                                                                        java.lang.String to)
        Get translations from https://d2.duolingo.com/api/1/dictionary/hints//?tokens=````
        Parameters:
        words - A single word or a list
        from - Source language as abbreviation
        to - Destination language as abbreviation
        Returns:
        Dict with words as keys and translations as values
